name: RateADrug.com
tag_list: side-effects, adverse-effects, drugs, prescription-drugs, medications, survey, ratings, over-the-counter, database, health
overview:
RateADrug.com is a free online venue where users can anonymously rate and review over 5,000 prescription and over-the-counter drugs in short online surveys. Users can view survey results and user comments for any drug.

RateADrug.com picks up where clinical trials and FDA disclosures leave off. The goal is to create healthcareâ€™s most comprehensive user-sourced database of short and long-term prescription drug side-effects, efficacy and overall benefits information. Patients can use this information together with their doctorâ€™s advice and FDA disclosures to achieve the best possible outcome for their (or their loved ones) medical condition.

RateADrug.com’s methodical crowd-sourced evaluations complement conventional medical practice and provide no-cost large group studies of thousands of prescription drugs and therapies. Individual survey takers can ensure that their medications are right for them – as well as look for better alternatives.

Unlike most major online health site, RateADrug.com does not accept advertising or informational content from pharmaceutical manufacturers. Doctors and health care practitioners are welcome to submit comments about drugs and health issues.
